title: Surface Mount Electronics Assembly for Terrified Beginners
subtitle: Day 2 - 17:30
description: Surface mount electronics for terrified beginners. Learn to assemble tiny parts on circuit boards by building a working power supply. Anyone can do it. Yes, even you who never touched anything electronic before. 90-100mins, 20€/kit, avoid caffeine immediately before. Max 17 participants per session, there is a PAPER!!1! signup list in the hardware hacking area.
